name: Pirate Chase
description:
Endless casual gameplay! Test your skills as a pirate ship captain navigating the open seas. But that's the easy part! Rival pirate ships will be on your tail, trying to sink your ship.

*Upgrade to more powerful pirate ships and cannons as you collect treasure.
*Restore life by navigating into the red crosses.
*Game has a leaderboard, see if you can reach the top!

Pirate Chase has simple intuitive controls, tap at the left or right side to turn your ship. Simple and fun.
